title: Enterprise Content Management System (CMS) Platform
description: Development of a robust and scalable CMS for dynamic content administration, with advanced user roles and database optimization.

title: High-Volume B2B E-commerce System
description: Backend for a high-volume B2B e-commerce system, designed to handle real-time inventory management and payment gateways.

title: Project Management Application (SPA)
description: Development of a complete Single Page Application (SPA) for collaborative project management, with interactive user interface and real-time communication.

title: Microservices API for Financial Services
description: Design and implementation of a microservices suite to process financial transactions, ensuring high availability, security, and data consistency.

title: Personalized Customer Portal with Dashboard
description: Development of a web portal where clients can access their information, history, and an interactive dashboard with relevant data.

title: Online Booking and Scheduling System
description: Complete web application for managing service bookings, with availability optimization and automated notifications.

title: Backend for Mobile Logistics Application
description: Development of a high-performance RESTful API for a mobile logistics application, including shipment tracking and route management.

title: Real-time Data Streaming Platform
description: Implementation of a system for ingesting and processing large volumes of real-time data, with instant analysis and visualization.

title: Centralized Authentication and Authorization System
description: Microservice dedicated to user management, authentication (JWT, OAuth2), and role-based authorization for multiple client applications.

title: Administrative Task Automation Tool
description: Creation of an internal application to automate complex administrative processes, improving operational efficiency and reducing manual errors.
